name: Temperaturus Maximus
description1: Obfuscate: Place a -50 accuracy mantle and get a pip if enemy has a shield [0 pips]
description2: Vicious Insult: Taunt for 2 turns [0 pips]
description3: Temper: Gift 1 pip and clear DoT for a 75, 3 turn HoT [1 pip]
description4: Flashpoint: Deal a 150, 3 turn DoT and an extra 100 damage if your team has a minion [2 pips]
description5: Broiler: Deal a 375, 3 turn DoT [4 pips]
description6: Fulmination: Deal 300, 4 turn Dot to all enemies and an extra 150 damage if your team has a minion [6 pips]
description7: Up In Smoke: Place a -50 accuracy mantle on enemy team and gain a pip if enemy has a shield [3 pips]
description8: Blood Boil: Deal 150 damage and detonate DoT if you have a HoT [2 pips]
description9: Flame On: Deal a 300, 3 turn DoT to self and deal 225 damage to all enemies [4 pips]
description10: Turbo Charge: Gift 2 pips to whole team and clear DoT for 125, 5 turn HoT [5 pips]

name: Julius Freezer
description1: Brace For Impact: Place a 100 shield or remove mantle for 3 turn bubble of 100 shield[0 pips]
description2: Stare Down: Taunt for 2 rounds, 3 rounds if you have a mantle [0 pips]
description3: Parry Pig: Push mantle to enemy then deal 50 damage [1 pip]
description4: Surprise Shark: Deal 100 damage or 225 damage if you have taunt active [2 pips]
description5: Hunker Down: Place 250 shield on team, turns into 3 turn bubble of 250 shield if someone has a mantle [4 pips]
description6: Sudden Snow: Deal 125 damage to all enemies or 300 damage if you have taunt active [5 pips]
description7: Eye Spy: Deal 100 damage and place a 75 trap if enemy has a mantle [2 pips]
description8: Countermeasure: Place a 3 turn bubble of 100 shield [1 pip]
description9: Undermine: Deal 25 damage and clear blade for a -50 weakness [0 pips]
description10: Troll Call: Summon an Ice minion [3 pips]

name: Maximus Voltus
description1: Eye For Weakness: Place a 50 weakness, 2 turn bubble on enemy [0 pips]
description2: Gather Will: Place a 100 blade and clear DoT for a 75, 3 turn HoT [1 pip]
description3: Tide Control: Deal 75 damage and clear enemy HoT for a 50 weakness, 2 turn bubble [1 pip]
description4: Dogs Of Storm: Deal 150 damage or 225 damage if enemy has a bubble [2 pips]
description5: Crushing Cascade: Deal 150 damage to all enemies or 225 damage if enemy has a bubble [4 pips]
description6: Big Bad Bird: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and place a 75 weakness if you have a HoT [5 pips]
description7: Riptide: Place a 50 weakness and deal 50 damage if enemy has a bubble [0 pips]
description8: Weatherproofing: Place a 150 blade on whole team and clear DoT for a 100, 2 turn Hot [3 pips]
description9: Snow Bully: Deal 150 damage and place a 75 weakness if you have a HoT [2 pips]
description10: Terrible Flu: Place a 125 weakness, 2 turn bubble on all enemies [3 pips]

name: Opthalamos Vitor
description1: Arboreal Assault: Deal 25 damage or expel minion if enemy is minion [0 pips]
description2: Nurture: Heal for 25 HP and gift 1 pip, gifts 2 pips if target is dead [1 pip]
description3: Gah, Spider!: Deal 100 damage or 250 damage if enemy team has a minion [2 pips]
description4: Semi-Charmed Sprite: Place a 300, 3 turn HoT and heal for 50 if you have a blade [3 pips]
description5: Stand Fast: Place afterlife on an enemy that gives own team 150 HP each [4 pips]
description6: Gnome Mercy: Deal 125 damage to all enemies, turns into 325 damage if enemy team has a minion [5 pips]
description7: Angelic Wrath: Deal a 75, 3 turn DoT on enemy and push a DoT from yourself to enemy
description8: Switcheroo: Take one DoT from each person on team and push them to one enemy [3 pips]
description9: Glorious Unicorn: Heal own team for 50 and gift 1 pip, gifts 2 pips if teammate is defeated [4 pips]
description10: Battle Cry: Place afterlife on enemy that gives own team 50 blades [1 pip]

name: Balaar Deathglaze
description1: Pluto: Deal 50 damage and steal enemy Hot [0 pips]
description2: Phantom Pain: Place a 75 weakness [0 pips]
description3: Unseelie Ally: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT and place a 100 anti-heal shield [2 pips]
description4: Betrayal: Place a 200 trap and clear blade for a 75 weakness [3 pips]
description5: Herald Of Hades: Steal 200 HP [4 pips]
description6: Confounding Fiend: Deal 125 damage to all enemies and clear blade for a 100 weakness (This will double attack an enemy if they have a blade) [5 pips]
description7: Pernicious Pig: Deal a 150, 3 turn DoT and an extra 75, 3 turn DoT if enemy has a trap [1 pip]
description8: Champion's Blight: Deal a 250, 5 turn DoT to all enemies, placing a 100 anti-heal shield on each [5 pips]
description9: Wave Of Frailty: Place a 150 weakness on all enemies [4 pips]
description10: Foul Concoction: Place afterlife that deals a 250, 5 turn DoT to each enemy [3 pips]

name: Justicebringer Legaton
description1: Spiked Buckler: Place a protected 75 shield and a 50 blade [0 pip]
description2: Thieving Beetle: Swap shield / trap then deal 75 damage [1 pip]
description3: Spiked Shield: Place a protected 100 shield and a 100 blade [2 pips]
description4: Colossal Scorpion: Deal 125 damage to all enemies [3 pips]
description5: Stunning Swarm: Deal 225 damage and stun enemy [4 pips]
description6: Phalanx: Place a protected 150 shield and a 150 blade on whole team [6 pips]
description7: Reinforce: Swap shield / trap then place a protected 300 shield [3 pips]
description8: Curse-Eater: Deal 300 damage and remove DoT on self for a 200, 4 turn HoT on self [4 pips]
description9: Feedback Loop: Swap HoT / DoT then gift 2 pips [2 pips]
description10: Tide Of Battle: Place a global bubble that gives everyone double pips [0 pips]
